divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were apending the night in the family cabin...we came outside when we saw a blue light...the light stayed in the sky for approx. 5 mins...we couldnt detect where it came from because of the mtn.s...but we felt the presence of something "not" right...afterwards time had lapsed the we couldnt account for...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gate City
This sighting has never been favorited.
